Message:
A little before
Cerberus and I became witches,
back when our mother
was still kind to us...

Whenever we’d help her,
she’d give us candy as a reward.

The sweetness tasted
just like happiness...
So to us, candy was proof
that something good happened.

That’s why every year
for Cerberus’s birthday,
I’d give her handmade candy
as a present.

After our family abandoned us
and we started living
on that mountain, though...
I couldn’t give her
candy anymore...
But, this year will be different!

To make up for all the times
I couldn’t give her any candy,
I’ll give her the tastiest one ever!

Now, it’s time to roll up my sleeves
and get to cooking...!
